meta.tone: Pulp noir, supernatural horror, secret wars
meta.target_use: Tabletop RPG rulebook / quickstart / GM reference

core_concepts.overview: Heaven and Hell are real. Monsters walk among men. Secret organizations, hunters, and gifted bloodlines vie for control in post-war America. Players are a mix of mundane and supernatural characters guarding the world from disclosure and annihilation.
core_concepts.core_engine: 2d6 base checks with stacking dice mechanics; keep the two highest dice
core_concepts.wounds_instead_of_HP: Location-based wound tracks with Light/Moderate/Severe/Fatal (or Direct/Devastating/Critical depending on variant)

steps: Step 1: Attributes (Option D - baseline + roll + point pool)
Step 2: Choose Bloodline (level 1 trait, level-gated powers)
Step 3: Choose Background (core 10) -> gives competencies, talent(s), flavor perk
Step 4: Choose Class (determines role/archetype and wound-track/toughness)
Step 5: Assign Competencies & Talents per background and class
Step 6: Set Fate Pool and starting gear

attributes_generation_option_d.roll_method: 4d6 drop lowest for each attribute; add result to baseline
attributes_generation_option_d.notes: This gives consistent competence with room for standout stats and player agency.

character_creation.starting_equipment: Depends on background/class; see Background entries

base_check.description: Roll 2d6, apply attribute modifier, stack dice from competencies/talents/situational modifiers, keep two highest dice.

negative.darkness: add penalty dice (roll extra dice but discard highest two)
negative.wounds: penalty dice depending on wound severity

modifiers.keep_highest_rule: When rolling multiple dice, keep the two highest

dice_resolution.example: Player rolls 5d6 (due to competency & talents) -> keep best 2 -> sum those two -> add attribute modifier

Mind.description: Intellect, reasoning, perception, knowledge, investigative skill

Soul.description: Willpower, charisma, spiritual attunement, social power

attributes.modifier_rule: Every 10 points above 50 = +1 modifier; every 10 below 50 = -1

classes.overview: Classes define role, archetype, wound-toughness, and mechanical backbone.

list.name: Brawler
list.role: Frontline melee; high toughness; grappling and heavy hits

list.name: Gunner
list.role: Firearms specialist; ranged combat and marksmanship

list.name: Hunter
list.role: Tracker and monster-slayer; favored tactics vs. supernatural

classes.notes: Class die (d12,d10,d8,d6) can be used as flavor/toughness indicator; archetype thresholds used for wound severity.

talents_and_competencies.overview: Talents are broad skill trees with sub-talents and ranks; Competencies are narrow proficiencies granting +1 die.

Lore.Rank2: ask GM one truthful fact once/day
Lore.Rank3: prepare ritual or craft a tool

Coercion.Rank3: force a mortal one short command once/session (Soul save)

competencies.definition: Specific, narrow proficiencies that grant +1 die when relevant
competencies.stacking: Competency + Talent ranks + attribute modifier stack to produce dice pool

competencies_by_level.level3: gain 1 competency or upgrade an existing one

talents_by_level.level3: increase rank or new sub-talent Rank1
talents_by_level.level6: increase rank or new sub-talent Rank1
talents_by_level.level10: one sub-talent reaches Rank3 and unlocks special maneuver

bloodlines.overview: Bloodlines define supernatural heritage and grant passive traits and level-gated powers at levels 1, 3, 6, 10.

mechanics.costs_and_limits: Abilities can have uses/day, Fate Pool costs, Soul costs, or social exposure consequences

backgrounds.overview: Background = life before the hunt. Grants competencies, talents (Rank1), and flavor perk. Progression table covers levels 1/3/6/10.

level10.signature: Know a Guy (introduce helpful NPC once/session)
Forbidden Rite (turn failed roll into success once/session at cost)
Pull from Death (stabilize fatal wound once/session if treated quickly)
Command the Room (seize social spotlight once/session)

wounds_and_damage.design_intent: Adeptus Titanicus-inspired location tracks scaled to humans; weapon strength + d6 roll vs class thresholds determines wound severity (Direct/Devastating/Critical)
wound_roll_procedure: 3) Compare result to target's archetype thresholds (Direct/Devastating/Critical).
4) Mark wound level on targeted location track.

direct.mechanic: -1 die to actions involving that location

devastating.mechanic: -2 dice to related actions; location impairment

critical.mechanic: limb lost or incapacitation; torso/head death risk

bleed_and_escalation.rule: Moderate/Severe (Devastating) wounds require bleed checks each combat round/scene. Failure escalates wound one step.
bleed_and_escalation.first_aid: stabilizes and stops escalation; does not fully heal

healing_rules.critical: permanent unless magic or extraordinary surgery

supernatural_integration.vampire: auto-downgrade one severity on Torso wounds; feeding restores wounds
supernatural_integration.lycanthrope: ignore Light wounds to arms/legs; regenerate Light->Moderate once per round in some forms
supernatural_integration.celestial: may spend Fate to negate Fatal wound once/session; healing touch
supernatural_integration.warlock: rituals can shift or absorb wounds at cost

aiming.effect: +1 die or choose hit location next attack

suppressive_fire.effect: -1 to -2 dice to anyone acting in the zone

called_shot.effect: -2 dice but force location on success

grappling.mechanic: opposed Body test; success immobilizes; critical restrains limb/weapon

dodge_dive.mechanic: reaction Body test vs attacker; success reduces attacker dice or avoids hit

overwatch.effect: attack resolves before target moves when triggered

close_quarters_tactics.throw/shove: opposed Body; knock prone or push

dual_wielding.effect: +1 die but miss risk/penalty; talent mitigates

melee_clash.mechanic: opposed Body+dice; higher success inflicts wound; tie = both Light wounds

advanced_combat.environmental_interaction: GM rewards creativity with +/- dice rather than new complex subsystems

core_principles: Hybrid system: passive innate + level-gated selectable powers
Bloodline defines innate powers; Class defines application
Powers use dice appropriate to effect (d6/d10/d100) and stack with talents/competencies
Fate Pool can boost supernatural rolls or prevent catastrophic failure

level_gated_mechanics.choice_at_gated_levels: player picks one ability from list appropriate to bloodline/class
level_gated_mechanics.scaling: powers increase dice, effects, or uses with higher level
level_gated_mechanics.balance: powers have limits (cooldown, uses/day, Soul cost, or public exposure)

supernatural_abilities_framework.integration_with_wounds: Supernatural attacks use same wound/location system; healing powers usually downgrade severity by 1 step and rarely undo Fatal without high-level effect

uses: Flip a failure into a critical success
Boost supernatural roll in emergency (GM adjudication)
fate_pool.refresh: Major milestones or GM discretion (level up, story beats)
fate_pool.narrative: Represents cinematic fate, last-ditch heroism, or divine/ infernal favor

Ashwood Foundation.role: Hunters, purge abnormal to protect humanity

Covenant of St. Michael.role: Balance - discern evil from misunderstood good; eliminate real threats

Black Chamber.role: Exploit supernatural for national interest; morally gray, quasi-intelligence

quickstart_guide.purpose: Two-page intro for players, covers creation, rolling, wounds, example play
steps_summary: 1. Roll attributes (4d6 drop lowest per attribute) + add 40 baseline + distribute 12 bonus pool
3. Assign competencies and talents (as background/class provides)

rolls.player_dice_pool: 2d6 base + competency + talent ranks -> example 5d6 keep 2
rolls.player_roll_result: 6+4 = 10, add attribute modifier e.g., Body +5 -> final 15 = success

example_play.damage_flow: On success -> location roll -> weapon strength + d6 -> compare to archetype thresholds -> mark wound level

cheat_sheet.visual_notes: Minimalist wound diagram with 4 markable slots per body part: Direct/Devastating/Critical

wound_diagram_spec.print_notes: Minimalistic clean layout, each slot a checkbox for quick tracking
